metadata.title: USN-7153-1 -- PHP vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled long string inputs in two database drivers. An attacker could possibly use this  issue to write files in locations they would not normally have access to. (CVE-2024-11236)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7153-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-bcmath - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-bz2 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-cgi - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-cli - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-common - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-curl - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-dba - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-dev - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-enchant - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-fpm - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-gd - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-gmp - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-imap - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-interbase - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-intl - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-json - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-ldap - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-mbstring - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-mcrypt - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-mysql - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-odbc - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-opcache - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-pgsql - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-phpdbg - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-pspell - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-readline - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-recode - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-snmp - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-soap - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-sqlite3 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-sybase - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-tidy - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-xml - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-xmlrpc - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-xsl - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 php7.0-zip - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm13 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
